document_data.name: Feverbalm
document_data.mainbody: '''Feverbalms''' were a type of flower native to the [[Savage Frontier]] region. They also were considered to be a type of a [[herb]], as they had medicinal properties.
document_data.Usage: In order to access the medicinal properties of feverbalms, creatures were known to boil them into a [[tea]]. This tea had the effect of temporarily curing a creature of insanity.
